actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1132.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 10392, a bill to establish a Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship in Social and Political Thought at the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars at the Smithsonian Institution and to establish a trust fund to provide a stipend for such fellowship.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R.10392 (Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 10392, a bill to establish a Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship in Social and Political Thought at the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars at the Smithsonian Institution and to establish a trust fund to provide a stipend for such fellowship.
